description:
Bristol Cloud Native & DevOps are excited to announce our next event with Senior Engineer, Tess Barnes. Tess works for consulting firm, Made Tech, working closely with their vast array of Public Sector clients.

On Thursday 8th September, Tess will be doing a talk titled; "Cloud vs Covid success: Choosing your VPN for your remote everything".

Synopsis:

From supporting staff working from home to onboarding new starters, how do you go about deciding on a solution that allows secure connections in a way that is easily maintained?

Back In 2019, we might have used VPNs around 10% of the time to keep our connections secure. Now, as a global pandemic has triggered a rise of remote working, we're all experiencing 'new' challenges about keeping our connections secure, while continuing to give employees flexibility over how they work.

The answer could be Cloud-based solutions

Join Senior Engineer Tess Barnes as she walks through some contextual examples of Cloud-based solutions and discusses the key factors and considerations to take into account when choosing the right option for you.

Bio:

Tess Barnes is a Senior Engineer working for Made Tech and their clients in Bristol. Her experience with AWS and Azure-based solutions has led her to believe that the Cloud is not an abstract panacea and the best tool to use is the one that fits the job you’re facing.
title: Cloud vs Covid success: Choosing your VPN for your remote everything
